hero.thirdText: Yacht Ape is a collection of unique digital apes that you can own in NFT format

about.firstText: WHO GOT FED UP WITH BORING AND HYPOCRITIC COMMONPLACE THIS IS HOW THE IDEA OF ESCAPING AND DYNAMIC
about.secondText: EACH ARTWORK IN THE COLLECTION TELLS A STORY OF ONE JOURNEY. ARTS ARE RANDOMLY GENERATED BY USERS

mapCards.title: YAPE DROP
mapCards.text: All owners of APE NFTs and all future collections will receive a percentage of sales based on the number of NFTs they own

mapCards.title: New Collection
mapCards.text: Launch of the 2nd YACHT Collection Releasing the first version of the Ape Slam Game

mapCards.title: Token
mapCards.text: Launch your own token, the proceeds of which will go to a global fund to LAUNCH YACHT CLUB AND PROMOTE it

mint.text: Join the YACHT APE community to be one of the first to receive our limited edition NFT
